attributes.review: i downloaded this app with high hopes for my shriveled orange of a president, but when i got it, it started glitching out and it wouldnâ€™t let me in. it wiped my data from the app and gave my phone a virus which wiped all other data from the apps on my phone! I thought it was a virus from me watching p0rnhub at first, but when all the pictures in my camera roll changed to oranges, resembling our president, i knew it had to be this app. I put my phone down on the couch but the orange just let spreading until it covered my phone. thanks to your app, my phone is now permanently orange. It also managed to track down my address and sent a Trumpie to my house which is a personal violation! I only realized it was a distraction once i heard my mother yell for help, quickly followed by a muffled scream in our living room which was overflowing with oranges! Turns out, Donald Duck- I mean, Trump, and his lover Mike Pence weâ€™re kidnapping my mother and forcing her to receive a spray tan like Donald Trump! Thanks to the ugly spray tan, my father divorced her. This app tore my family apart, made my phone permanently orange, and filled my living room with an annoyingly excessive amount of oranges. Every once in a while, i mistake the lung orange pile of oranges for our president. I was very disappointed with how much annoying inconvenience this ugly app caused.
